segments.text: The perspective shows the kitchen in such detail.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the window and garden beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the faucet runs unchecked, overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours onto the floor in sheets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, the boy's on the stool reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is within his grasp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could crash down any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl encourages him with her raised hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel tense watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside makes it all more ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR
